Events that occurred on 31 January

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1892 - J.R.R. Tolkien is christened at the Cathedral of St. Andrew and St. Michael in Bloemfontein.
2006 - In Elven Lands is released.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: Note: Months of the Shire Calendar only have 30 days, so no events have nor will happen on the 31st.
